## Source: ossf-malware-analysis (80d76ff3efd3a37e90d86c31f34ad01633504eb17709869928335523c66a2a55)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'tzinfo-i18n' @ 0.1.0 (rubygems) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
